SEARCH
Package com.flipkart.dao

Interface AdminDaoInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdminDaoServices
public interface AdminDaoInterface
Interface for admin data access object (DAO) operations. Provides methods for managing professors, courses, and student registrations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

    addCourse(Course course)
    Adds a new course to the catalog.

  • Method Details

    • addProf

      String addProf(Prof prof, String username) throws UserAlreadyExistsException
      Adds a new professor to the system.
      Parameters:
      prof - The `Prof` object representing the new professor.
      username - The username of the admin adding the professor.
      Returns:
      A `String` message indicating the result of the addition operation (e.g., success or failure).
      Throws:
      UserAlreadyExistsException - If a professor with the same ID or username already exists.

    • removeProf

      boolean removeProf(String profID) throws UserNotFoundException
      Removes a professor from the system.
      Parameters:
      profID - The ID of the professor to be removed.
      Returns:
      `true` if the professor was successfully removed; `false` otherwise.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If no professor with the given ID is found.

    • updateCourse

      boolean updateCourse(String courseCode, Course updatedCourse) throws CourseAlreadyExistsException, CourseNotFoundException
      Updates an existing course with new details.
      Parameters:
      courseCode - The code of the course to be updated.
      updatedCourse - The `Course` object containing the updated course details.
      Returns:
      `true` if the course was successfully updated; `false` otherwise.
      Throws:
      CourseAlreadyExistsException - If a course with the new details already exists.
      CourseNotFoundException - If no course with the given code is found.

    • addCourse

      boolean addCourse(Course course) throws CourseAlreadyExistsException
      Adds a new course to the catalog.
      Parameters:
      course - The `Course` object representing the new course.
      Returns:
      `true` if the course was successfully added; `false` otherwise.
      Throws:
      CourseAlreadyExistsException - If a course with the same ID already exists.

    • removeCourse

      boolean removeCourse(String courseID) throws CourseNotFoundException
      Removes a course from the catalog.
      Parameters:
      courseID - The ID of the course to be removed.
      Returns:
      `true` if the course was successfully removed; `false` otherwise.
      Throws:
      CourseNotFoundException - If no course with the given ID is found.

    • registerStudent

      boolean registerStudent(String studentID) throws UserNotFoundException
      Registers a student based on their ID.
      Parameters:
      studentID - The ID of the student to be registered.
      Returns:
      `true` if the student was successfully registered; `false` otherwise.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If no student with the given ID is found.

    • viewCourses

      Set<Course> viewCourses()
      Retrieves the list of all available courses.
      Returns:
      A `Set` containing all the courses in the catalog.

    • viewProfessors

      Set<Prof> viewProfessors()
      Retrieves the list of all professors.
      Returns:
      A `Set` containing all the professors.

    • viewUnapprovedStudents

      Set<Student> viewUnapprovedStudents()
      Retrieves the list of students whose registrations are not yet approved.
      Returns:
      A `Set` containing all the unapproved students.
